name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a
wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.  
  
**_The theme of this cookalong is Neapolitan Pizza._**  

  * **The cookalong** : Learn to make and stretch the Pizza Dough, assemble the pizza with toppings, taste different cheeses and the house sauce. Learn how to use a wood fired oven to bake pizzas.
  * **The meal** : Virgin Mojito, the Pizza that you make, Dessert.

Note: The cookalong includes vegetarian and non-vegetarian meal options.

name: Hula Harmony
description:
A toy that was once designed for recreation, hula hooping gradually took the
world by a storm, starting with the United States in the late 1950s. Today
hula hooping is not just a playful activity, but also a form of exercise and
artistic expression. A cultural phenomenon, influencing music, fashion, and
dance.

**_This experience will involve a guided introduction to hula hooping, tricks
and transitions and flow choreography through some fun activities!_**

name: Echoes of Calm
description:
The use of sound for healing dates back thousands of years to various ancient
cultures. Indigenous peoples have long used drums, chanting, and other
instruments for ceremonial and therapeutic purposes. These practices were
often tied to spiritual rituals and were believed to have healing properties.

This immersive sound bath experience is built on the enduring belief in the
power of sound, and sets you on the path to healing, relaxation, and spiritual
growth.
